text: Te'omra sampradayara ahankarai netasakale ka’le, ‘he churaa'iba! Niscaya ami tomaka arau tomara lagata yisakale imana aniche sihamtaka amara janapadara paraa uliya'i dima na'iba tomaloke amara dharmadarsata ubhati ahiba lagiba’. Te'om ka’le, ‘yadi'o ami se'itoka ghrna karao tathapi'o (badhya karaabane)’
